Restart Quiz
Quiz Rules
Quit Quiz
Music:

Quiz Rules

Welcome to lightCity Bible Quiz.

This quiz is designed to help us measure and improve our growth of God’s Word.

Here are some things to know about the quiz:
  1. A Question can have multiple Answers (All Answers could be correct).
    1. If only one or two(in the case of more than two correct options) correct Answer is selected, the Question will be passed as failed.
  2. When an option(s) is selected, it is colored Yellow, at this point your Answer has not been comfirmed yet, you will need to click the confirm button at the bottom right of your screen to confirm your selection.
    1. Once the confirm button is clicked, your Anwser is locked, it cannot be undone.
    2. But before clicking the comfirm button, when the option(s) selected is still colored Yellow, you can un-select option(s) selected and select another option(s).
  3. If you do not know the Answer to a Question and do not wish to select any option(s), you can click the confirm button to show the right Answer.
    1. Please note that the Question will be passed as failed.
  4. Hints to Questions and Explanations to Answers are provided for some Questions.
    1. For Hints that are Scriptural references, click on the Scriptural reference to show the verse.
  5. You can change your settings such as Theme, Font and Music ON/OFF by clicking icon at the top of your screen.
  6. As you may have seen, there are two categories. CHILDREN and ADULTS categories, please feel free to choose any, as no knowlegde is a waste.
  7. You can review the Quiz after the Quiz has been completed by clicking the review button (it is very easy to see).
    1. The Quiz Review shows you the Questions and their Right Answer(s) and Explanations (for options that have one).
  1. Which of these is not an act of righteousness
    • Fasting
    • Praying
    • Walking
    • Giving
  2. God is known as the GOD of
    • Timothy, Phillip, and Matthew
    • Ethan, John, and Asaph
    • Matthew, Paul, and Silas
    • Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob
  3. We have _____ GOD and we are to _____ him alone
    • 72, Sacrifice
    • 100, Give
    • 1, Worship
    • 20, Talk
  4. Wisdom is the _____ thing, in all your getting get _______
    • Principle, Wisdom
    • Power, Life
    • Science, Engineering
    • Wisdom, Understanding
  5. The wages of Sin is_____ the gift of GOD_____
    • Bad, Good
    • Death, Eternal Life
    • Punishment, Sweets
    • Short Life, Long Life
  6. Everyone who calls on the Name of the LORD shall be ____
    • Destroyed
    • Killed
    • Persecuted
    • Saved
  7. Has any Man seen God?
    • All Men have seen God
    • God is invisible and cannot be seen
    • No
    • Two Men have seen God
  8. God is a
    • Man
    • Spirit
    • Angel
    • Cherubim
  9. Who was the first Man Created?
    • Moses
    • Jesus
    • Adam
    • Judah
  10. Who is higher
    • Woman
    • Man
  11. God loves a ________
    • Cheerful Giver
    • Dancer
    • Worker
    • Sinner
  12. When Adam left the Garden, He left the Presence of God
    • No
    • Yes
  13. Who is the Mother of all the Living
    • Sarah
    • Racheal
    • Eve
    • Mary
  14. Did Enoch die
    • Yes
    • No
  15. Jacob's name was changed to
    • Issachar
    • Israel
    • Isaac
    • His name was not changed
  16. What tree was Adam commanded not to eat of
    • Tree of Life
    • The apple tree in the Garden
    • The tree of the Knowledge of good and evil
    • The good and evil tree
  17. Who are Jews
    • Nigerian leaders
    • Hausa People
    • Children of Abraham
    • Yoruba people
  18. Which of these people are Jews This Question has multiple Answers
    • Esther
    • King Xerxes
    • King Saul
    • Balaam
  19. Angels have wings
    • Yes
    • No
  20. Where is Enoch
    • The New Jerusalem
    • On Earth
    • In Hell
    • In Heaven
  21. Why did GOD destroy the inhabitants of the Earth with a flood This Question has multiple Answers
    • He had the power to do it
      • GOD is not a tyrant, He is just in all His ways, the inhabitants of the Earth had forsaken GOD and His ways, so GOD was just to have destroyed them.
    • GOD repented that He had made Man on the Earth and His heart was filled with pain
    • Man’s wickedness was great upon the Earth and every inclination of his heart was evil all the time
    • The Earth was corrupt in GOD’S sight and was full of violence
  22. Who is Melchizedek
    • King of Salem
    • Priest of the Most-High GOD
    • The first of GOD’S creation
    • The first to not die
  23. Who rained down fire on Sodom and Gomorrah
    • Satan
    • The Angel of Yahweh
    • Abraham
    • Cherubim
  24. Who was the first Priest of the Most-High GOD The first man to be created
    • Melchizedek
    • Jesus
    • Aaron
    • Adam
  25. Is the Garden of Eden still on Earth
    • Yes
    • No
      • It was destroyed by the flood
  26. Does the Bible encourage us to be hasty [Prov 19:2, 21:5, 29:20]
    • No
    • Yes
  27. When you give testimony in a lawsuit do not______
    • Side with the crowd
    • Do not tell the truth
    • Do not avoid the questions
    • Dance with the crowd
  28. Do not follow the crowd in doing ________ [Exo 23:2]
    • Playing the drums
    • Wrong
    • In eating
    • Lying
  29. Does GOD tell lies
    • Yes
    • No
  30. Who is the Father of all Liars The one who’s native language is lying
    • Judas
    • Satan
    • Ananias and Sapphira
    • Simon the Magician
  31. Should Christians believe in magic
    • No
    • Yes
  32. Should Christians steal
    • Yes
    • No
  33. Should Christians fight
    • No
    • Yes
  34. Should Christians show kindness
    • Yes
    • No
  35. Should Christians place curses on people
    • Yes
    • No
  36. We pray to GOD the Father of our LORD Jesus Christ
    • Yes
    • No
  37. Should Christians worship idols
    • No
    • Yes
  38. Christians are to dress with decency and propriety
    • No
    • Yes
  39. Should Christians protest
    • Yes
    • No
  40. Should Christians disobey their Parents
    • Yes
    • No
  41. Should Wives submit to their Husbands
    • Yes
    • No
  42. Should Husbands beat their Wives
    • No
    • Yes
  43. Should Parents love their Children
    • Yes
    • No
  44. Should Women teach in Church
    • No
    • Yes
  45. Why should Women cover their heads when praying or prophesying
    • Because of the Angels
    • As a sign of authority
    • To not show off their hair styles in Church
    •  To help them pray very well
  46. Who is the Head of the Church
    • Apostle Peter
    • Apostle Paul
    • Mary the Mother of Jesus
    • Jesus Christ the Son of the Living GOD
  47. GOD _____ the _____ of His people
    • Is angry at, Bowing down
    • Inhabits, Praise
    • Glorfies, Truth
    • Delights in, Singing
  48. Is worship prayer
    • Yes
    • No
  49. Man looks at the _______, GOD looks at the ________
    • Heart, Outward
    • Character, Behaviour
    • Outward, Heart
    • Works, Faith
  50. Does GOD know our thoughts
    • Yes
    • No
  51. What fruit did GOD command Adam not to eat
    • The apple tree that is in the midst of the garden
    • Watermelon
    • Pineapple
    • The fruit of the tree that is in the midst of the garden
  52. Why did GOD choose and commend Abraham
    • Abraham begged GOD to choose him
    • Abraham made sacrifice to Yahweh
    • He knew Abraham would command his children to follow Yahweh
    • Abraham left his Father’s house
  53. What is Faith
    • A system of thinking
    • Knowledge of GOD and his ways
    • Knowing the spiritual laws, principles operations and workings
    • Obedience to GOD
General Knowledge

Quiz Rules

Welcome to lightCity Bible Quiz.

This quiz is designed to help us measure and improve our growth of God’s Word.

Here are some things to know about the quiz:
  1. A Question can have multiple Answers (All Answers could be correct).
    1. If only one or two(in the case of more than two correct options) correct Answer is selected, the Question will be passed as failed.
  2. When an option(s) is selected, it is colored Yellow, at this point your Answer has not been comfirmed yet, you will need to click the confirm button at the bottom right of your screen to confirm your selection.
    1. Once the confirm button is clicked, your Anwser is locked, it cannot be undone.
    2. But before clicking the comfirm button, when the option(s) selected is still colored Yellow, you can un-select option(s) selected and select another option(s).
  3. If you do not know the Answer to a Question and do not wish to select any option(s), you can click the confirm button to show the right Answer.
    1. Please note that the Question will be passed as failed.
  4. Hints to Questions and Explanations to Answers are provided for some Questions.
    1. For Hints that are Scriptural references, click on the Scriptural reference to show the verse.
  5. You can change your settings such as Theme, Font and Music ON/OFF by clicking icon at the top of your screen.
  6. As you may have seen, there are two categories. CHILDREN and ADULTS categories, please feel free to choose any, as no knowlegde is a waste.
  7. You can review the Quiz after the Quiz has been completed by clicking the review button (it is very easy to see).
    1. The Quiz Review shows you the Questions and their Right Answer(s) and Explanations (for options that have one).
